title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 30th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Special Assistant to President Trump & White House Deputy Press Secretary Hogan Gidley about how the White House is responding to the possibly impeachment inquiry into President Trump.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd Starnes speaks with Fox News Contributor Robert Jeffress about the response he has gotten from around the world after President Trump tweeted his comments from Fox News.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Trump 2020 National Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany about how the campaign is reacting to the Biden campaign asking networks to stop speaking to Rudy Giuliani.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Anne Graham Lotz about her new book "Jesus in Me" and gives an update on her battle with breast cancer.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-AZ) about whether Democrats will continue to pursue an impeachment inquiry against President Trump.



Email Embed

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with College of The Ozarks President Jerry Davis about what the members of the student body are learning while in Washington, DC.
description:

Todd speaks with Special Assistant to President Trump & White House Deputy Press Secretary Hogan Gidley about how the White House is responding to the possibly impeachment inquiry into President Trump.
